arabicText: صُمٌّۢ بُكْمٌ عُمْىٌۭ فَهُمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Deaf,	dumb	and	blind;	and	they	are	not	to	
return.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bahre	gooñge	andhe	to	woh	phir	āne	wāle	
nhiñ

arabicText: أَوْ كَصَيِّبٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فِيهِ ظُلُمَـٰتٌۭ وَرَعْدٌۭ وَبَرْقٌۭ يَجْعَلُونَ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِم مِّنَ ٱلصَّوَٰعِقِ حَذَرَ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ مُحِيطٌۢ بِٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	like	a	rainstorm	from	the	sky,	in	which	
are	darkness,	thunder	and	lightning;	they	
thrust	their	fingers	in	their	ears	due	to	the	
thunderclaps,	fearing	death;	and	Allah has	
the	disbelievers	encompassed.. Or	like	a	rainstorm	from	the	sky,	in	which	
are	darkness,	thunder	and	lightning;	they	
thrust	their	fingers	in	their	ears	due	to	the	
thunderclaps,	fearing	death;	and	Allah has	
the	disbelievers	encompassed.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	 jaise	 āsmān	 se	 utarta	 pāni	 ke	 is meiñ	
andheriyāñ haiñ	 aur	 garaj	 aur	 chamak	
apne	 kānoñ	 meiñ	 ungliyāñ thooñs	 rahe	
haiñ	 kadak	 ke	 sabab,	maut	 ke	 dar	 se	 aur	
Allah	kafiroñ ko	ghere	huwe	hai

arabicText: يَكَادُ ٱلْبَرْقُ يَخْطَفُ أَبْصَـٰرَهُمْ ۖ كُلَّمَآ أَضَآءَ لَهُم مَّشَوْا۟ فِيهِ وَإِذَآ أَظْلَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ قَامُوا۟ ۚ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَذَهَبَ بِسَمْعِهِمْ وَأَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
It	 seems	 the	 lightning	 may	 snatch	 away	
their	sight	from	them;	whenever	it	flashes	
they	walk	in	it,	and	when	it	darkens	 they	
stand	 still;	 if	 Allah willed,	 He	 could	 take	
away	their	hearing	and	their	sight;	indeed	
Allah is	Able	to	do	all	things
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	 jaise	 āsmān	 se	 utarta	 pāni	 ke	 is meiñ	
Bijli	 yooñ	 ma'loom	 hoti	 hai	 ke	 unki	
nigaheiñ	uchak	le	jayegi	jab	kuch	chamak	
huyi	us	meiñ	chalne	lage	aur	jab	andhera	
huwa	 khade	 rah	 gye	 aur	 Allah	 chāhta	 to	
unke	 kān	 aur	 ānkheiñ	 le	 jāta	 be-shak	
Allah	sab	kuch	kar	sakta	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّكُمُ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	mankind!	Worship	your	Lord,	Who	has	
created	 you	 and	 those	 before	 you,	in	 the	
hope	of	attaining	piety
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 logon!	 apney	 Rab	 ko	 poojo	 jis	 ne	
tumheiñ	 aur	 tum	 se	 agloñ	 ko	 paida	 kiya	
yeh	ummeed	karte	hue	ke	 tumhe	parhezgāri	mil

arabicText: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فِرَٰشًۭا وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بِنَآءًۭ وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَأَخْرَجَ بِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ رِزْقًۭا لَّكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ لِلَّهِ أَندَادًۭا وَأَنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	 One	 Who	 has	 appointed	 the	 earth	 a	
base	 for	 you,	 and	 the	 sky	 a	 canopy	- and	
caused	water	to	pour	down	 from	the	sky,	
thereby	 producing	 fruits	 as	 food for	 you;	
and	 do	 not	 knowingly	 set	 up	 rivals	 to	
Allah
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh jis	 ne	 tumhare	 liye	 zameen	 ko	
bichauna	 aur	 āasman	 ko	 imarat	 banaya	
aur	āasman	se	pāni	utāra	to	us	se	kuch	phal	nikāle	tumhāre	khāne	ko	to	Allah	ke	liye	jān	boojh	
kar	barabar	wala	na	thahrao

arabicText: وَإِن كُنتُمْ فِى رَيْبٍۢ مِّمَّا نَزَّلْنَا عَلَىٰ عَبْدِنَا فَأْتُوا۟ بِسُورَةٍۢ مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ وَٱدْعُوا۟ شُهَدَآءَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 if	 you	 are	 in	 any	 doubt	 concerning	
what	We	have	sent	down	upon	Our	distinguished	bondman	(Prophet	Muhammad - peace	 and	
blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	bring	 forth	a	 single	 surah	(chapter)	equal	 to	it;	and	call	upon	all	 your	
supporters,	other	than	Allah,	if	you	are	truthful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	 tumheiñ	 kuchh	 shak	 ho	is	meiñ	jo	 ham	 ne	apne	 khās	 bande	 per	 utāra	 to	us jaisi	ek	
soorat	to	le	āao	aur	Allah	ke	siwa	apne	sab	himayatiyoñ	ko	bula	lo	agar	tum	sachche ho

arabicText: فَإِن لَّمْ تَفْعَلُوا۟ وَلَن تَفْعَلُوا۟ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلنَّارَ ٱلَّتِى وَقُودُهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلْحِجَارَةُ ۖ أُعِدَّتْ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	you	are	unable	to	bring	forth	(one	chapter)	- and	We	declare	that	you	can	never	bring	one	
- then	fear	the	fire	(of	hell),	the	fuel	of	which	is	men	and	stones;	kept	ready	for	the	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	agar	na	la	sako	aur	ham	 farmaye	dete	haiñ	ke	hargiz	na	la	sakoge	 to	daro	us	āg	se	jis	ka	
eeñdhan	ādmi	aur	patthar	haiñ	tayyar	rakhi	hai	kāfiroñ	ke	liye

arabicText: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ كُلَّمَا رُزِقُوا۟ مِنْهَا مِن ثَمَرَةٍۢ رِّزْقًۭا ۙ قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى رُزِقْنَا مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَأُتُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُتَشَـٰبِهًۭا ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَآ أَزْوَٰجٌۭ مُّطَهَّرَةٌۭ ۖ وَهُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	give	glad	tidings	to	those	who	believe	
and	 do	 good	 deeds;	 that	 for	 them	 are	
Gardens	beneath	which	rivers	flow;	when	
they	 are	 provided	 with	 a	 fruit	 of	 the	
Gardens,	 they	 will	 say,	 “This	 is	 the	 same	
food	 as	 what	 was	 given	 to	 us	 before”	
whereas	 it	 is	 in	 resemblance;	 and	 in	 the	
Gardens	 are	 pure	 spouses	 for	 them;	 and	
they	shall	abide	in	it	forever.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	khush	khabri	de	unheiñ	jo	 Īmān	lāye	
Aur	 achchhe	 kām	 kiye	 ke	 unke	 liye	 bāgh	
haiñ	 jinke	 neeche	 nahreiñ	 rawāñ	 jab	
unheiñ	 un	 bāghoñ	 se	 phal	 khane	 ko	diya	
jaye	 ga	 soorat	 dekh	 kar	 kaheñ	 ge	 yeh	 to	
wohi	rizq	hai	jo	hameiñ	pahle	mila	tha	aur	
woh	 soorat	 meiñ	 milta	 julta	 unheiñ	 diya	
gaya	aur	unke	liye	un	bāghoñ	meiñ	suthri	
biwiyāñ	 haiñ	 aur	 woh	 un	 meiñ	 hamesha	
raheiñ	ge

arabicText: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَسْتَحْىِۦٓ أَن يَضْرِبَ مَثَلًۭا مَّا بَعُوضَةًۭ فَمَا فَوْقَهَا ۚ فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ فَيَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّهُ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَيَقُولُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًۭا ۘ يُضِلُّ بِهِۦ كَثِيرًۭا وَيَهْدِى بِهِۦ كَثِيرًۭا ۚ وَمَا يُضِلُّ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. Indeed	 Allah does	 not,	 for	 the	 sake	 of	
explanation,	 shy	 to	 illustrate	 an	 example	
of	 anything,	 whether	 it	 is	 of	 a	 gnat	 or	
something	further	(inferior)	than	it;	so the	
believers	 know	it	is	 the	 Truth	 from	 their	
Lord;	 as	 for	 the	 disbelievers,	 they	 say,	
“What	 does	 Allah intend	 by	 such	 an	
example?”	He	misleads	many	thereby,	and	
He	 guides	 many	 thereby;	 and	 with	 it	 He	
misleads	only	those	who	are	rebellious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Beshak	 Allah	 is	 se	 haya	 nhi	 farmāta	 ke	
misāl	 samjhane	 ko	 kaisi	 hi	 cheez	 ka	 zikr	
farmaaye,	mach-char	ho	ya	us	se	badh	kar	
to	woh	jo	Īmān	lāye	woh	jānte	haiñ	ke	yeh	
unke	rab	ki	taraf	se	haq hai	rahe	kāfir	woh	
kahte	 haiñ	 aisi	 kahawat	 meiñ	 Allah	 ka	
kiya	 maqsood	 hai,	 Allah	 bahuteroñ	 ko	 is	
se	gumrāh	karta	hai	aur	bahuteroñ	ko	hidāyat	farmāta	hai	aur	is	se	unheiñ	gumrāh	karta	hai	jo	
be-hukm	haiñ

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَنقُضُونَ عَهْدَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مِيثَـٰقِهِۦ وَيَقْطَعُونَ مَآ أَمَرَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦٓ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 break	 the	 covenant	 of	 Allah
after	 ratifying	 it	 - and	 sever	 what	 Allah
has	 ordered	 to	 join,	 and	 who	 cause	
turmoil	 (evil	 /	 religious	 chaos)	 in	 the	
earth;	it	is	they	who	are	the	losers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	 Allah	 ke	 ‘ahed	 ko	 tord	 dete	 haiñ	 pakka	 hone	 ke	 b‘ād	 aur	 kāt-te	 hai	 us	 cheez	 ko	jiske	
jordne	ka	Khuda	ne	hukm	diya	aur	zameen	me	fasād	phailāte	haiñ	wohi	nuqsān	meiñ	haiñ

arabicText: كَيْفَ تَكْفُرُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَكُنتُمْ أَمْوَٰتًۭا فَأَحْيَـٰكُمْ ۖ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُحْيِيكُمْ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
What	 has	 made	 you	 disbelieve	 in	 Allah?	
Whereas	you	were	dead	and	He	gave	you	
life;	 then	 He	 will	 give	 you	 death,	 then	 bring	 you	 to	 life	 again,	 and	 then	 it	 is	 to	 Him	 you	 will	
return!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bhala	tum	kiyuñ	kar	Khuda	ke	munkir	hoge	halānke	tum	murda	they	Usne	tumheiñ	jilaya	phir	
tumheiñ	mārega	phir	tumheiñ	jilaye	ga	phir	uski	taraf	palat	kar	jaoge

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ لَكُم مَّا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًۭا ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَسَوَّىٰهُنَّ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍۢ ۚ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
It	 is	 He	 Who	 created	 for	 you	 all	 that	 is	 in	 the	 earth;	 then	 He	 inclined	 towards	 the	 heaven,	
therefore	fashioning	it	as	proper	seven	heavens;	and	He	knows	everything.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Wohi	hai	jisne	tumare	liye	banāya	jo	kuch	zameen	meiñ	hai	phir	āsmān	ki	taraf	istiwa	(qasad)	
farmaya	to	theek	sāt	āsmān	banāye	aur	woh	sab	kuch	jānta	hai

arabicText: وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى جَاعِلٌۭ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ خَلِيفَةًۭ ۖ قَالُوٓا۟ أَتَجْعَلُ فِيهَا مَن يُفْسِدُ فِيهَا وَيَسْفِكُ ٱلدِّمَآءَ وَنَحْنُ نُسَبِّحُ بِحَمْدِكَ وَنُقَدِّسُ لَكَ ۖ قَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَمُ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. And	(remember)	when	your	Lord	said	to	
the	 angels,	 “I	 am	 about	 to	 place	 My	
Caliph	in	the	earth”;	they	said,	“Will	You	
place	(as	 a	 caliph)	one	who	will	 spread	
turmoil	 in	 it	 and	 shed	 blood?	 Whereas	
we	glorify	You	with	praise	and	proclaim	
Your	 Sanctity”;	 He	 said,	 “I	 know	 what	
you	do	not.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 yād	 karo	 jab	 tumhāre	 Rab	 ne	
Farishtoñ	se	farmāya	maiñ	zameen	meiñ	
apna	 nāyeb	 banane	 wala	 huñ	 bole	 kiya	
aise	 ko	 nāyeb	 karega	 jo	 us	 meiñ	 fasād	
phailāye	 aur	 khooñ	 reziyāñ	 kare	 aur	
hum	 tujhe	 sarahte	 huwe	 teri	 tasbeeh	
karte	 aur	 teri	 pāki	 bolte	 haiñ,	 farmāya
mujhe	ma'loom	hai	jo	tum	nhi	jānte
